verses.verse: And Moses <WH4872> went <WH3212> and spoke <WH1696> these words <WH1697> unto all Israel <WH3478>.

And he said <WH559> unto them <WH3967>, I am an hundred and twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> this day <WH3117>; I can <WH3201> no more go out <WH3318> and come in <WH935>: also the Lord <WH3068> has said <WH559> unto me <WH5674>, You shall not go over this Jordan <WH3383>.

The Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>, he will go over <WH5674> before <WH6440> you <WH8045>, and he will destroy these nations <WH1471> from before <WH6440> you <WH3423>, and you shall possess them <WH3091>: and Joshua, he shall go over <WH5674> before <WH6440> you <WH3068>, as the Lord has said <WH1696>.

And the Lord <WH3068> shall do <WH6213> unto them as he did <WH6213> to Sihon <WH5511> and to Og <WH5747>, kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, and unto the land <WH776> of them <WH8045>, whom he destroyed.
And the Lord <WH3068> shall give them up <WH5414> before your face <WH6440>, that you may do <WH6213> unto them according unto all the commandments <WH4687> which I have commanded you <WH6680>.

Be strong <WH2388> and of a good courage <WH553>, fear <WH3372> not <WH6206>, nor be afraid of them <WH6440>: for the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>, he it is that does go <WH1980> with you <WH7503>; he will not fail you <WH5800>, nor forsake you.

And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> unto Joshua <WH3091>, and said <WH559> unto him in the sight <WH5869> of all Israel <WH3478>, Be strong <WH2388> and of a good courage <WH553>: for you must go <WH935> with this people <WH5971> unto the land <WH776> which the Lord <WH3068> has sworn <WH7650> unto their fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> them <WH5157>; and you shall cause them to inherit it.

And the Lord <WH3068>, he it is that does go <WH1980> before <WH6440> you <WH7503>; he will be with you, he will not fail you <WH5800>, neither forsake you <WH3372>: fear not <WH2865>, neither be dismayed.

And Moses <WH4872> wrote <WH3789> this law <WH8451>, and delivered <WH5414> it unto the priests <WH3548> the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>, which bore <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH3068>, and unto all the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478>.

And Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> them <WH559>, saying, At the end <WH7093> of every seven <WH7651> years <WH8141>, in the solemnity <WH4150> of the year <WH8141> of release <WH8059>, in the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521>,

When all Israel <WH3478> is come <WH935> to appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> in the place <WH4725> which he shall choose <WH977>, you shall read <WH7121> this law <WH8451> before all Israel <WH3478> in their hearing <WH241>.

Gather <WH6950> the people <WH5971> together <WH6950>, men <WH582>, and women <WH802>, and sons <WH2945>, and your stranger <WH1616> that is inside your gates <WH8179>, that they may hear <WH8085>, and that they may learn <WH3925>, and fear <WH3372> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> all the words <WH1697> of this law <WH8451>:

And that their sons <WH1121>, which have not known <WH3045> any thing <WH8085>, may hear, and learn <WH3925> to fear <WH3372> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>, as long as <WH3117> you live <WH2416> in the land <WH127> where you go over <WH5674> Jordan <WH3383> to possess it <WH3423>.

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Behold <WH3117>, your days approach <WH7126> that you must die <WH4191>: call <WH7121> Joshua <WH3091>, and present <WH3320> yourselves in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, that I may give him a charge <WH6680>. And Moses <WH4872> and Joshua <WH3091> went <WH3212>, and presented <WH3320> themselves in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

And the Lord <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> in the tabernacle <WH168> in a pillar <WH5982> of a cloud <WH6051>: and the pillar <WH5982> of the cloud <WH6051> stood <WH5975> over the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168>.

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Behold <WH7901>, you shall sleep with your fathers <WH1>; and this people <WH5971> will rise up <WH6965>, and go a whoring <WH2181> after <WH310> the gods <WH430> of the strangers <WH5236> of the land <WH776>, where they go <WH935> to be among <WH7130> them <WH5800>, and will forsake me <WH6565>, and break my covenant <WH1285> which I have made with them <WH3772>.

Then my anger <WH639> shall be kindled <WH2734> against them in that day <WH3117>, and I will forsake <WH5800> them <WH5641>, and I will hide my face <WH6440> from them <WH398>, and they shall be devoured, and many <WH7227> evils <WH7451> and troubles <WH6869> shall happen to <WH4672> them <WH559>; so that they will say in that day <WH3117>, Are not these evils <WH7451> come <WH4672> upon us <WH430>, because our God is not among us <WH7130>?

And I will surely <WH5641> hide <WH5641> my face <WH6440> in that day <WH3117> for all the evils <WH7451> which they shall have worked <WH6213>, in that <WH3588> they are turned <WH6437> unto other <WH312> gods <WH430>.

Now therefore write <WH3789> you this song <WH7892> for you <WH3925>, and teach it the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: put <WH7760> it in their mouths <WH6310>, that this song <WH7892> may be a witness <WH5707> for me against the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

For when I shall have brought <WH935> them into the land <WH127> which I swore <WH7650> unto their fathers <WH1>, that flows <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>; and they shall have eaten <WH398> and filled <WH7646> themselves <WH1878>, and grown fat; then will they turn <WH6437> unto other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and serve <WH5647> them <WH5006>, and provoke me <WH6565>, and break my covenant <WH1285>.

And it shall come to pass <WH7227>, when many evils <WH7451> and troubles <WH6869> are happened <WH4672> them <WH7892>, that this song shall testify <WH6030> against <WH6440> them as a witness <WH5707>; for it shall not be forgotten <WH7911> out of the mouths <WH6310> of their seed <WH2233>: for I know <WH3045> their imagination <WH3336> which they go about <WH6213>, even now <WH3117>, before I have brought <WH935> them into the land <WH776> which I swore <WH7650>.
Moses <WH4872> therefore wrote <WH3789> this song <WH7892> the same day <WH3117>, and taught <WH3925> it the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And he gave Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> a charge <WH6680>, and said <WH559>, Be strong <WH2388> and of a good courage <WH553>: for you shall bring <WH935> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> into the land <WH776> which I swore unto them <WH7650>: and I will be with you.
And it came to pass <WH4872>, when Moses had made an end <WH3615> of writing <WH3789> the words <WH1697> of this law <WH8451> in a book <WH5612>, until they were finished <WH8552>,
That Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> the Levites <WH3881>, which bore <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH3068>, saying <WH559>,

Take <WH3947> this book <WH5612> of the law <WH8451>, and put <WH7760> it by the side <WH6654> of the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>, that it may be there for a witness against you <WH5707>.

For I know <WH3045> your rebellion <WH4805>, and your stiff <WH7186> neck <WH6203>: behold <WH2416>, while I am yet alive with you this day <WH3117>, you have been rebellious <WH4784> against the Lord <WH3068>; and how much more after <WH310> my death <WH4194>?

Gather <WH6950> unto me all the elders <WH2205> of your tribes <WH7626>, and your officers <WH7860>, that I may speak <WH1696> these words <WH1697> in their ears <WH241>, and call <WH5749> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776> to record against them <WH5749>.

For I know <WH3045> that after <WH310> my death <WH4194> you will utterly <WH7843> corrupt <WH7843> yourselves <WH5493>, and turn aside from the way <WH1870> which I have commanded <WH6680> you <WH7451>; and evil will happen to <WH7122> you in the latter <WH319> days <WH3117>; because you will do <WH6213> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the Lord <WH3068>, to provoke him to anger <WH3707> through the work <WH4639> of your hands <WH3027>.
And Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> in the ears <WH241> of all the congregation <WH6951> of Israel <WH3478> the words <WH1697> of this song <WH7892>, until they were ended <WH8552>.
